name: Beneath The Cherry Trees / 桜の樹の下には
description: "There are bodies buried beneath the cherry trees!" A Japanese poetic literature "Beneath The Cherry Trees(1928)" by Motojirō Kajii starts from a shocking sentence. We made a short Visual Novel based on this story with Illustrator Kotori's watercolor works, beautiful photographs, and imposing musics.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP/7/8.1/10 Processor: Celeron M1.6GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: It`s a wonderfull artwork, the music help to create the atmosphere of poetry. Please make more things like this.
WTF... This is the weirdest thing i have ever read... You'll know why at the end when it mentions armpits XD
